root: ^Student: “All that trash… The smell is horrendous.”
^Dr. Waterson: “Luckily, the city has cracked down on issuing fines for this sort of thing.”
^Dr. Waterson: “But wonderful job! Looks like you’ve got most of the garbage out of here.”
^Student: “But despite all I’ve done so far, it still looks so bad…”
^Student: “Is it even possible to restore it?”
^Dr. Waterson: “I have faith in you. Cleaning up the trash was a big step, and it’s only up from here.”
^Dr. Waterson: “Your job now is to remove the harmful plants to restore the area to a healthier, more balanced state.”
^Student: “I’ll give it a go. I… I think I can do this.”
^Dr. Waterson: “Be wary, though. Some invasive animals have been terrorizing the local environment here.”
^Dr. Waterson: “You are sure to run into at least a few of them. Keep an eye out!”
